import sys
num = sys.stdin.readline().split()

print(int(int(num[0]) * float(num[1])))

import sys

num = sys.stdin.readline().split() # read input

print(int(int(num[0]) * float(num[1])))
import sys

num = sys.stdin.readline().split()

print(int(int(num[0]) * float(num[1])))
import sys

def main():
    a, b = map(float, sys.stdin.readline().split())
    print(int(a * b))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
